title: Lower priority queue
body:
so, i recently played a game of top AD bard (yes i know, im scum) but in the middle of the game my wifi just sorta went down, no idea why.
i got a lower priority queue from that and i am just wondering if its meant to punish your for "crashes" like that or is it a bug?
and if its intentional thats fine too.

replies.body: The lower priority queue is meant to give you time to troubleshoot whatever is causing you to leave games, and prevent interruptions that would have otherwise occurred while in queue.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system would only mark you after multiple leaves, and not a single game.  It's really important to resolve whatever is causing you to disconnect or leave games, and in this case I'd recommend a wired connection if possible.  Let me know if you need any help in resolving that!

doesnt happen anymore tho, and ty for the reply (kinda late ik, have not been online on the forums for a while)
